dct_title_s: Palestinæ delineatio ad geographiæ canones revocata
dct_alternative_sm: Palestinae delineatio ad geographiae canones revocata
dct_description_sm: Henri le Roy fecit ; Michel van Lochom graveur et imprimeur ; addictissimus tibi et obbsequentissimus Phillipvs Briet.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines (inset maps Syriæ veteris descriptio -- Exodvs Israelis).
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria unius horae".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, settlements, paths of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
3 inset maps: Syriae veteris descriptio -- Hierusalem -- Exodus Israelis.
Appears in Philip Briet's Parellela geographie veteris et novae, 1641-1649.
